Chickpea Feta Salad
as a side dish
1 Lemon
Olive Oil
1 Tins Chickpeas
Â½ Small Red Onion
1 Red Chili
10-15 Cherry Tomatoes
Mint
Basil
100g Feta
  1. Make a 3:1 dressing with the Lemon Juice and Oil
  2. Add Chickpeas, Onion, Chili and Tomatoes in a bowl, and add enough dressing to make it a bit sloppy at the bottom
  3. Before serving, check seasoning for Pepper, add the chopped herbs, and crumble in the Feta
